Text.Name: PlayerName
Text.OnTextChanged: Parent.DoCommand.onshow=('hide_window MainHUD.Casting.AutoLoad') COND1=(Text=='NoName') COND2=(Text==sName) COND3=(Text=='') COND=(COND1 || COND2 || COND3) Parent.DoCommand.visible=(COND ? false : true) sName=Text

Button.Name: Load
Button.OnShow: show_window MainHUD.Casting hide_window MainHUD.Casting show_window Custom.DrumsUI_CM_Settings Parent.LoadCheck.OnTextChanged=Parent.LoadCheck.codeToCopy Visible=false

Text.codeToCopy:
COND1=(Parent.Parent.Name == '_HUD') COND2=(Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_CM_Settings.Name == 'DrumsUI_CM_Settings') COND=(COND1 && COND2) Parent.Init.visible=COND ? true : false Visible=COND ? false : true
COND=(Parent.Parent.Name == 'MainHUD') Visible=COND ? false : true
Text.Name: LoadCheck

Button.Name: LoadAllLoop
Button.OnxHide: bCheck=(iCount > 50) iCount=(bCheck ? 1 : iCount) Visible=(bCheck ? false : true) Parent.SetupSlotsLoop.visible=(bCheck ? true : false)

Button.Name: SetupAllCmdText
Button.OnPress:
sNAME=Parent.PlayerName.Text
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.bCheckCmdText=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.DrumsUI_CM_Settings.POI.DrumsUI_' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.PoiShowAlways') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sUserCmdText=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.DrumsUI_CM_Settings.POI.DrumsUI_' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.PoiDescription') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sDefaultCmdText=Parent.UserSettings.' ## sCMD ## '.defCmdText') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.SetupCmdText.press=true
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.UserSettings.' ## sCMD ## '.cmdText=(Parent.SetupCmdText.sCOND)') Parent.DoCommand.press=true

Button.Name: SetupSlotsLoop
Button.OnxHide: bCheck=(iCount > 50) iCount=(bCheck ? 1 : iCount) Visible=(bCheck ? false : true)

Page.Name: TrackTime
Page.OnShow: Location=(0,0) Parent.CheckTime.UpdateNext=100 Parent.TimeRemain.text=(' ')

Page.Name: CheckTime
Page.OnShow:
vProgress=Parent.Progress.Bar.Progress vDuration=Parent.TrackTime.Left vFormula=(1 / vProgress) vCastTotal=(vFormula * vDuration) vCastCurrent=(vCastTotal * vProgress) vCastRemain=(vCastTotal - vCastCurrent) vCastRemain=int(vCastRemain / 100) vCastRemain=(vCastRemain / 10)
vCastRemainLeft=int(vCastRemain) vCastRemainRight=(vCastRemain - vCastRemainLeft) vCastRemainRight=int(vCastRemainRight * 10)
Parent.UpdateTime.vTimeRemain=(vCastRemainLeft)##('.')##(vCastRemainRight)##('s')
bDoUpdate=(vDuration > UpdateNext) Parent.UpdateTime.visible=(bDoUpdate)
Visible=false

Page.Name: UpdateTime
Page.OnShow:
Parent.TimeRemain.text=(vTimeRemain) Parent.CheckTime.UpdateNext=(Parent.CheckTime.UpdateNext + Parent.CheckTime.UpdateInc)
Visible=false

Button.Name: TriggerCmdText
Button.OnShow: Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('COND="Parent.Parent.Slots.' ## Parent.TriggerSpell.sText ## '.visible" == true') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.TriggerCmdText2.onpress="Parent.Parent.Slots.' ## Parent.TriggerSpell.sText ## '.sMacro"') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.TriggerCmdText2.MYSPELL=Parent.TriggerSpell.Text Parent.TriggerCmdText2.MYTARGET=Parent.Parent.TargetName.Text Parent.TriggerCmdText2.visible=(Parent.DoCommand.COND ? true : false) Parent.TriggerSpell.OnTextChanged=Parent.TriggerSpell.codeToCopy Visible=false

Text.codeToCopy:
COND1=(Parent.Parent.Parent.Name == '_HUD') COND2=(Text == 'Default') COND3=(Text == '') COND=(COND1 && '!'COND2 && '!'COND3)
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('sStripQuotes="' ## Text ## '"') Parent.DoCommand.press=true bStrip=(Parent.DoCommand.sStripQuotes == Text) Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('sStripQuotes2=' ## Text) Parent.DoCommand.visible=(bStrip ? false : true) sText=(bStrip? Parent.DoCommand.sStripQuotes : Parent.DoCommand.sStripQuotes2)
Parent.TriggerCmdText.Visible=(COND ? true : false)
Text.Name: TriggerSpell
Text.OnTextChanged:
COND1=(Parent.Parent.Parent.Name == '_HUD') COND2=(Text == 'Default') COND3=(Text == '') COND=(COND1 && '!'COND2 && '!'COND3)
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('sStripQuotes="' ## Text ## '"') Parent.DoCommand.press=true bStrip=(Parent.DoCommand.sStripQuotes == Text) Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('sStripQuotes2=' ## Text) Parent.DoCommand.visible=(bStrip ? false : true) sText=(bStrip? Parent.DoCommand.sStripQuotes : Parent.DoCommand.sStripQuotes2)
Parent.TriggerCmdText.Visible=(COND ? true : false)
